title: Putin's Speech, Annotated: A Close Look at the Russian Leader's Ukraine Address
content:
1. Putin's Speech, Annotated: A Close Look at the Russian Leader's Ukraine Address  The New York Times
  2. 'War is my biggest horror': Russians brace for deadly conflict, economic hardship as Putin orders invasion  USA TODAY
  3. Putin's Recognition of Breakaway Republics in Ukraine Poses a Long-Term Crisis  Bloomberg
  4. Editorial: Putin wants to undermine Western unity. Here's why US and NATO cannot let that happen.  Chicago Tribune
  5. Editorial: A cataclysmic event based on ego-driven lies. Sound familiar?  STLtoday.com
  6. View Full Coverage on Google News

localize.title: プーチンの演説、注釈付き。プーチン大統領のウクライナ演説に迫る
普京的演讲，有注释。细看俄罗斯领导人的乌克兰讲话
普京的演講，有註釋。細看俄羅斯領導人的烏克蘭講話
